    • Constructor Detail

      • PGLargeObjectReader

        public PGLargeObjectReader(org.postgresql.PGConnection con,
                   long oid)
        Creates a new instance of PostgreLargeObjectReader for the defined connection and LargeObject ID
        Parameters:
        con - The PGConnection, that is used to retrieve the data
        oid - The ID of the LargeObject for which the reader should be created

      • read

        public int read(byte[] buf,
       int offset,
       int count)
        Function to retrieve data from the Large Object. It uses the native byte[] data byte to retrieve the data, which is the preferred way to get the data from the Datasase. In order to retrieve the whole file from the database you can use the size() method to create a sufficient byte array.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes read or -1 if nothing was read

      • getInputStream

        public java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return an InputStream object for the LargeObject associated with this reader
        Returns:
        the object of inputstream
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the size of the opened Large Object. It return -1 for a closed Large Object.
        Returns:
        Size of the LargeObject.
